text: Jesse James Hollywood (born January 28, 1980 in Los Angeles, California) is an American drug dealer and former fugitive. He kidnapped and had someone murder Nicholas Markowitz.Kracht, C., & D. Woodard, Five Years (Hanover: Wehrhahn Verlag, 2011).Markowitz, S., & J. Glatzer, My Stolen Son: The Nick Markowitz Story (New York: Berkley Books, 2010), pp. 205â€“206. == References == == Other websites == *Unsolved Mysteries profile *Jesse James Hollywood - Fox Network's America's Most Wanted profile Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:American kidnappers Category:American murderers Category:American prisoners Category:People from Los Angeles
title: Jesse James Hollywood
